website_summaries.verdict: A good budget set of inner tubes for anyone wanting a large supply at an affordable price.
pros: Size of the mountain biking tubes is small enough for some road tires
Tubes use the standard schrader valve found on most bike pumps
Comes in a pack of four
cons: No significant puncture and wear protection

customer_reviews.title: Not standard valve
customer_reviews.text: This is not a standard valve, it's European style. Meaning you will need to modify in order to use with a regular bicycle tire for a mountain bike or whatever. I had to modify just to use, which was a total pain in the. Took more time to just figure out how to install this thing. Youtube provided little help as well. Good luck with buying this bike tube. It may seem like a good price but don't buy, it's not a standard tube.
customer_reviews.author: Lovz 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great tube with an awesome surprise
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the others, this tube comes in shrink wrap and will stay protected while it’s in my saddle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tube blew up!
customer_reviews.text: Only road on the tube for about 6 miles and it blew up! took my tire with it and I had to pay to have a new tire , tube and wheel fixed. DONOT Buy this one , spend the money and get another brand. These ARE JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best purchase! Arrived on time and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rockfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency backup tubes.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a replacement or quick fix on the trails.
customer_reviews.author: Yanier Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bike tube... replaced an old leaky tube on my 29er
customer_reviews.author: Travis Crosland

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for MTB
customer_reviews.text: The valve core is not removable so sealant can not be added.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Kara Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged nicely and this is a quality tube, holding up really well... I have purchased other brands that literally leaked out of the box. BELL seems to have reasonable quality for the price :-)
customer_reviews.author: Troy E. West

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a decent replacement
customer_reviews.text: I've had these installed for about half a year on my bike and haven't had it leak since, so it seems to hold up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Standard bike tube replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality inner tube for my husbands bike. A standard tube.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Reist

customer_reviews.title: although the product seems satisfactory there was some packaging confusion ...
customer_reviews.text: although the product seems satisfactory there was some packaging confusion (resulting in some initial apprehension on my part) as the primary packaging suggested the valve was STANDARD (Schrader) design and not a Presta valve requested. But it did have a Presta valve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a spare. Hopefully It will be a while ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a spare. Hopefully It will be a while until I need it.
customer_reviews.author: 1lonefrary

customer_reviews.title: Bell 29" Inner Tube
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to fit my mountain bike. I bought two just incase for when I'm out biking. b
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Hutton

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back now
customer_reviews.text: An absolute waste of time and money... I ordered two of these tubes and they both had holes in them. How does that even happen?!?! I am sooo pissed off right now and I'll be expecting a full refund immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob King

customer_reviews.title: I assume it's good, no reason it shouldn't be
customer_reviews.text: It a spare for emergencies so it won't be used until I get a flat, I assume it's good, no reason it shouldn't be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: give me the wrong thing and it doesn't fit in.
customer_reviews.author: JIAQI MO

product_meta.title: Bell Standard and Self Sealing Bike Tubes
product_meta.description: 12-1/2", Self Sealing Bike Inner Tube, Sealant Inside Seals Most Holes Up To 1/8" Instantly While You Ride, Fits Tires With Width Range 1.75" - 2.25".
feature_bullets: Mold cured rubber for consistent side wall–prevents high pressure blow outs
High quality, reliably tested inner tube
Valve type & length: Presta; 40mm with cap
Great for Road and Mountain bike tires
